channel.title: Earns on Console Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Earns on Console Labs

item.title: Mochi Pay Twitter Extension
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Bounty Deadline: 11:59PM 5 June (IST) About the Bounty Mochi is a platform that allows Discord server owners to integrate trading supporting tools which is called Mochi Pay. Mochi Pay now provides 3 main functions: Payment without wallet-equipped: User can transfer token in Discord or from Discord to other social platforms (Telegram, Twitter, and Email). Users can create pay link and pay me request. Users can organize airdrop on Discord Superteam is sponsoring a bounty for developers to use Mochi Pay’s API to build a Twitter extension that allow users to perform these action on Twitter:

item.title: Mochi Raycast Extension
item.author: han@console.so (Han Ngo)
item.description: Deadline: 5 May, 11:59 PM (Indian Standard Time) About the Bounty Mochi is a platform that allows Discord server owners to integrate trading supporting tools called Mochi APIs. Mochi APIs now provides Token and NFT Data query: User can query Token price, marketcap, and movement; NFT rarity and raking and sales which support the investment decision. Superteam is sponsoring a bounty for developers to use Mochi APIs to build a Raycast extension, which meets the following requirement: Users should be able to use the Raycast extension to query the token price, info and movement; convert token; and NFT rarity, ranking and sales.
